      • generateBehaviourMap

        @RequestMapping(value="Widget/BehaviourMap",
                method=POST)
@ResponseBody
public String generateBehaviourMap(@RequestParam(value="file")
                                                      Long sourceId,
                                                      @RequestParam(value="filter",required=false)
                                                      Long filterId)
        Handler method for behaviour map creation.
        Parameters:
        sourceId - The ID of the parameter set files to use as an input.
        filterId - The ID of the filter file to restrain the output with.
        Returns:
        The ID of the created behaviour map file. Error message if behaviour map creation fails. Limit reached message if the behaviour map exceeds the allowed storage space.
